tvSpecials.title: Don't Waste Your Angel
tvSpecials.shortDescription: God’s given us His protection. But it’s up to us to make sure we’re not wasting it.
tvSpecials.name: Pastor Steven Furtick

tvSpecials.title: There's A Catch
tvSpecials.shortDescription: God wants to bless us, but the level we experience that blessing is up to us. Discover how your obedience can attract God’s blessing.
tvSpecials.name: Pastor Steven Furtick

tvSpecials.title: Don’t Blow It!
tvSpecials.shortDescription: We’re all busy, but are we busy doing what really matters? Discover how your priorities could be preventing your progress.
tvSpecials.name: Pastor Steven Furtick

tvSpecials.title: The ConTENtment Commandments
tvSpecials.shortDescription: We all want more from life, making contentment seem out of reach. In The ConTENtment Commandments, Pastor Steven shares ten ways to live a more content life.
tvSpecials.name: Pastor Steven Furtick

tvSpecials.title: What Are The Chances?
tvSpecials.shortDescription: When our lives feel ordinary, it can be difficult to feel like God is moving. Discover how miracles may be where you least expect them.
tvSpecials.name: Pastor Steven Furtick

tvSpecials.title: Disturbing the Peace (Jonathan Josephs)
tvSpecials.shortDescription: Peace may feel far away, but it doesn’t have to. Discover three things that may be disturbing your peace.
tvSpecials.name: Jonathan Joesphs
